channel.title: beta on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in beta on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-20
item.description: Cameo launches Cameo Calls, a service for fans to video chat with celebs (2 minute read) Cameo Calls lets fans chat one-on-one with influencers and celebrities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-17
item.description: AMC movie theaters will reopen on Aug. 20 with 15-cent tickets (2 minute read) More than 100 AMC cinemas across the US will open on August 20.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.
